properties.name: 555 Mission St
properties.description: This large plaza has several art and landscaping features. It is located in front of 555 Mission Streets and runs along the west side of the building. There are several distinct sitting areas with different styles of seating.

properties.name: 1 Bush Street
properties.description: This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.

properties.name: 560 Mission St
properties.description: This large plaza features a sculpture in a pool of water, a large bamboo grove, and various forms of seating. It is served by a cafe.

properties.name: 199 Fremont St
properties.description: This large plaza space features extensive rock landscaping and artwork. There are two adjoined areas, one of which has food service.

properties.name: Redwood Park
properties.description: This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.

properties.name: Trinity Alley
properties.description: Alley way with ample seating and greenery outside multiple restaurants.

properties.name: 345 California St - West C
properties.description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the Battery Street side, served by a cafe which has several tables in front, and no plants.

properties.name: 71 Stevenson St
properties.description: The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.

properties.name: Embarcadero Center West 1, 2, & 3
properties.description: Commercial Street throughout Embarcadero 1, 2, and 3 is a pedestrian mall on ground floor and 2nd level, which is accessed by an elaborate staircase system, flanked by waterfalls. Fountains, foliage, art work, and bench seating found throughout.

properties.name: 595 Market St
properties.description: This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.

properties.name: Commercial Street (235 Pine Entitlement)
properties.description: Linear park improvements along Commercial Street feature various types of trees and concrete linear seating. These spaces are served by many cafés and restaurants along Commercial Street. Additional seating is provided during lunch hours.

properties.name: 555/557 Market St
properties.description: Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.

properties.name: Millenium Tower Plaza
properties.description: This atrium features extensive artwork and is served by a bar/restaurant on the premises. It has various types of seating with tables, and high windows overhead.

properties.name: 50 California St
properties.description: Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.

properties.name: 600 California St
properties.description: A shady open space area with art in the form of sculptures. This snippet found on the northwest side of the building, up the stairs. It adjoins the open space of the adjacent building.

properties.name: 77 Beale St
properties.description: Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.

properties.name: Foundry Square NE
properties.description: This is one of three plazas fronting the intersection of 1st and Howard, forming Foundary Square. It features art sculptures and seating near a cafe.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - A (Starbucks)
properties.description: Thayer referenced something that is not part of the open space requirement, this is pedestrian improvement requirement.  Per Thayer:  This open space has benches and landscaping along the sidewalk on Folsom at street level.

properties.name: 1 California St
properties.description: Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.

properties.name: 150 California St
properties.description: This view terrace is located six stories above the street level. There is a large sculpture, long periods of sunlight, and several types of seating. There are extensive views of the surrounding area.

properties.name: 525 Market St
properties.description: This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.

properties.name: 222 2nd St
properties.description: An enclosed open space, with operable floor to ceiling windows and doors; located within the street-level lobby.

properties.name: 77 Van Ness Ave
properties.description: This space is in the front lobby of 77 Van Ness. It has tables and chairs and features a sculpture.

properties.name: 49 Stevenson St
properties.description: This pedestrian walkway has small fountains and an art sculpture are featured in this space. Plaza seating is available for patrons of Yank Sing restaurant only.

properties.name: 101 2nd St
properties.description: This greenhouse features large trees, windows, and art. It has two levels of space and is served by a cafe.

properties.name: 221 Main St
properties.description: An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.

properties.name: 100 California St
properties.description: This is a large plaza with planter boxes, along with smaller spaces along Davis Street. There is also space for food service to serve the plaza in the future.

properties.name: Citygroup Center
properties.description: Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.

properties.name: Foundry Square SE
properties.description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

properties.name: 200 California St
properties.description: This pedestrian seating area is on a widened sidewalk. Pedestrians may sit on linear seating that forms a planter box. There is a small, public sculpture next to the planter box.

properties.name: Marathon Plaza
properties.description: Large, triangular urban garden facing Second Street with a water feature, ample seating, and lush landscaping. Deli and restaurant open to the park provide food and additional seating.

properties.name: 201 Spear St
properties.description: Plaza with seating along planters.

properties.name: 50 Beale St
properties.description: Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.

properties.name: 55 Second St - A
properties.description: This large, indoor "park" located inside the historia building has a wooden floor, tables with chairs, and large, comfortable leather chairs on a carpeted section near the large window looking out on Stevenson Street.

properties.name: 345 California St - A
properties.description: This open space is provided in the form of a large plaza fronting California Street. Additionally, two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The plaza and east snippet are served by restaurants

properties.name: 25 Jessie St
properties.description: This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.

properties.name: Golden Gate University
properties.description: Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.

properties.name: 123 Mission St
properties.description: This large plaza features extensive landscaping and art. Seperate seating areas with seating characterize the area.

properties.name: 350 Mission St
properties.description: An enclosed open space, with operable sliding glass doors that open up to street frontage; located within the street-level lobby.

properties.name: Empire Park
properties.description: Empire park, located at 642 Commercial, is an urban garden that features a water fountain and landscaping. Along Commercial in front of Empire park, there are many widened sidewalk spaces which have benches and landscaping.

properties.name: 211 Main St
properties.description: Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.

properties.name: 444 Market  St
properties.description: Plaza with no seating.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - B (Starbucks)
properties.description: This open space has a small sitting space below street level on the corner of Folsom and Second, served by a café.

properties.name: 14 Fremont St
properties.description: This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.

properties.name: 650 California St
properties.description: This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.

properties.name: Foundry Square NW
properties.description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

properties.name: Gap Building
properties.description: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.

properties.name: 301 Howard St
properties.description: Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.

properties.name: 1 Post St
properties.description: Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.

properties.name: 55 Second St - B
properties.description: This space is located outside the rear entry of 55 Second Street. It has planter boxes that serve as seating throughout the plaza.

properties.name: 180 Howard St
properties.description: A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.

properties.name: 611 Folsom St
properties.description: Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.

properties.name: 1 Kearny St
properties.description: This rooftop terrace has extensive views of Market St. as well as rooftop architecture of nearby buildings. Landscaping and bench seating support this space.

properties.name: 100 1st St
properties.description: The large Sun Terrace features extensive landscaping and seating. Several art sculptures are featured, along with an elevated view of the street below. There is a 'grand' staircase (snippet) up to the Sun Terrace. Ground level arcade in front of building on Mission side features retail and eating/drinking establishments.

properties.name: 343 Sansome
properties.description: This fifteenth floor open space has excellent views of surrounding buildings and streets, as well as the San Francisco Bay. It has various types of seating and landscaping. It also has art in the form of a large sundial.

properties.name: Spear Street Plaza
properties.description: Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.

properties.name: 456 Montomery St
properties.description: This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.

properties.name: Rincon Center
properties.description: This large plaza space is found in the interior courtyard between Rincon Center 1 and Rincon Center 2. It features several art sculptures and different types of seating.

properties.name: 425 Market St
properties.description: An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.

properties.name: 345 California St - East B
properties.description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the Battery Street side, served by a cafe which has several tables in front, and no plants.

properties.name: Marriott Courtyard - C
properties.description: This space features extensive landscaping with several art attractions. Comfortable seating arrangements are located throughout the space. Food service nearby inside the hotel.

properties.name: Hampton Inn
properties.description: Rooftop sun and view terrace, with 360 degree views of the city; with limited seating benches.

properties.name: 100 Pine St
properties.description: This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.

properties.name: 1 Market St
properties.description: Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.

properties.name: Westfield Sky Terrace (Wesfield Center Mall)
properties.description: This extensive 9th floor rooftop space looks onto the dome of the mall and has views westward and sunlight. It does not have direct food service, but food may be found in the food court below in the mall.

properties.name: 333 Market St
properties.description: Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.

properties.name: 235 Second St
properties.description: This plaza is located on the corner of 2nd St. and Clementina St. It features several types of seating, served by a cafe.

properties.name: 135 Main St
properties.description: Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.

properties.name: 120 Howard St
properties.description: This space features plants along the entirety of the snippet and is served by an espresso cart.

properties.name: 201 Mission St
properties.description: Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.
